Hi, we are a group of machine learning (ML) practitioners in Austin, TX. We read ML papers together and discuss them in person once a month. If you are interested in learning about how our journal club works and how to join, please visit our [Tips](https://austinmljournalclub.github.io/readme.html) page.

## [Hongsup Shin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hongsupshin/)
Hongsup is the organizer of the Austin ML Journal Club. He organizes the club meetings, and maintains the blog and the journal club GitHub repository. 

He is a Principal ML Research Engineer at Arm and used to be a volunteer data scientist at Texas Justice Initiative, a criminal justice non-profit in Austin, TX. His background is computational neuroscience and behavioral ecology. He is interested in ML Ops, responsible AI, and AI ethics.

## [Kathrine (Kate) Behrman](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kate-behrman/)
She is a Staff ML Research Engineer at Arm in Austin, TX. She used to work for the USDA-NRCS and USDA-ARS as a Research Ecologist. Her background is in landscape and evolutionary ecology. She is interested in human AI interactions and responsible use of AI.

## [Brian King](https://www.linkedin.com/in/brianking387/)
Brian is a Senior ML Research Engineer at Arm. His background is in Bayesian statistics, and current interests include time series forecasting, uncertainty quantification for complex models, and causal inference.

## [Kshitij Aggarwal](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kshitij13/)
Kshitij is a Data Scientist at Bristol-Myers Squibb. His background is in astronomy and electrical engineering. He is interested in problem-solving using state-of-the-art AI tools and responsible use of AI.

## [Meghann Agarwal](https://www.linkedin.com/in/meghann-agarwal/)
Meghann is a Machine Learning Engineer at GDI. Her educational background is in physics, music, and Russian. Her current interests include multilingual NLP, operationalizing ML models and other software, and societal impacts of evolving modes of information propagation.

## [Saina Lajevardi](https://www.linkedin.com/in/saina199/)
Saina is a senior Data Scientist at Adobe Commerce, located in Austin, TX. Previously, she worked at Arm Cloud Technologies, where she developed machine-learning based frameworks in the IoT space. Her primary interests lie in problem-solving with a pragmatic approach.

Joel is a Machine Learning Engineer at Acrisure based here in Austin, TX. His background is in Computer Science and Fair ML. He is interested in MLOps, Music ML, Fair and Responsible AI, and Software and Data Engineering.

## [Athula Pudhiyidath](https://www.linkedin.com/in/athula-pudhiyidath)
